comment.body: Is it glued to the base? Lots of stores like to glue rocks and things to the bottom so it will die. Trim gently and not too much. Don't trim at all for the first month or so, so it gets acclimated.

@Planteater: They will glue any rocks or pebbles on top of the soil. It's thats fine your bought your tree from a reputable store. Big Box stores like to glue them down so the tree doesn't actually get any water.
